about.title: About Us
about.desc: Our company Elite Autos sell parts for BMW and Subaru, but we also have a 'Miscellaneous' section where you can find various products from other car brands. We are located in two states: Massachusetts and South Carolina. Our addresses where you can come in person to see the items you want to purchase. Additionally, we offer car detailing services, currently only in Massachusetts.

error.title: Ops Somthing Went Wrong!
error.desc: There was an issue retrieving the data. This could be due to a network problem or the server being temporarily unavailable. Please check your internet connection and try again later. If the issue persists, please contact support.

translation.callForm: Shortly, we will contact you to discuss about
translation.testDriveForm: By pressing the place button you will create an appointment for a test drive session with respective vehicle
translation.__desc__1: Thank you for your cooperation, we will contact you shortly.

payment_fail.title: Payment Failed
payment_fail.desc: We're sorry, your payment didn't go through. Please double-check your payment details and try again. If you continue to experience issues, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

payment_success.title: Payment Succeed
payment_success.desc: Your payment was successful! Please wait 3-5 minutes for the confirmation email to be sent to the address you provided.
